fields.name: Passives:
fields.value: - The King: Your role is revealed at the beginning of the game as simply "King". Any attempt to check your role, even your True role, will show up as "King" as well. You start with 6 HP and 6 cards. Your hand limit is 6. You only have 2 channels. You cannot participate in Duels.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Guards: Block! an attack. [2 uses, 2 CD]
- Doctors: Heal! 1 HP. Cleanse! an effect off of you of your choice. [2 uses, 2 CD] 
- Restrain: Prevent a player from using more than 1 card next phase (including reforged cards). [1 use, Unique]
- Retreat: Go to the Kingâ€™s Quarters the following Night phase. [1 use, Unique] 
- Evaluate: Pick a player. Learn if they win with you at the end of the phase (Susceptible). [1 use, Astral, Unique, Unlocks D3]
